column2:
"For example... There was an era where I wrote many books.
It was originally just notes on things I knew,
but everyone was so thankful for them."

"There were times when something was going to be interpreted wrong,
so I would change my name and take center stage,
correcting the explanation."

"Because of that, there was a time when the descendants
of my disciples were despised.
I guess that was more of a recent thing, though."

"Speaking of bad experiences,
helping the King of Britain was one of them."

"Contrary to how you all are taught,
he was quite stubborn and difficult to handle,
and there was much deceit and trickery."

"That's right, there was a time when I was in Japan as well.
There was much war and strife in Japan, and many evil
spirits showed up to feed on the negative energy."
